ast.name: Pin website icon
ast.comment:
Allows to pin website icon to start instead of a thumbnail preview.

Paste a website URL from the browser and the script will try to find an icon on the site, most suitable to be displayed on the corresponding live tile. You will then be able to tap the tile to open the site in the browser.

The script can be somewhat slow at times as it tries to look for the icon very thoroughly.

Note, that not all of the sites have icons of sufficient resolution to look nice on a live tile. If you can see a nice looking icon for a site on an Apple or Android device and the script fails to find it, post the site on the script's forum and I'll have a look.

body.text: Obsolete. Converts an ico image to omg using a separate web service.
Obsolete. Previously used together with ico favicons
